channel.title: Treatment Couches – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: SEERS 2 & 3 Section Bariatric Couches
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
These products meet the increasing requirements for providing examination couches with the capability of supporting extremely heavy patients. All these models have a safe working load and lifting capacity, from minimum height, of 325kgs (51 stone/715lbs).

Medicare Bariatric Couches - Model Choices

SM3573 - Bariatric 3 section couch with retractable wheels SM3673 - Bariatric 3 section couch with large wheel design SM4542 - Bariatric 2 section couch with retractable wheels SM4642 - Bariatric 2 section couch with large wheel design Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard 3 Section Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 325kgs (715lbs=51 stone)
  • Adjustable angle electric backrest from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Adjustable angle head/foot section from -25 to +75 degrees positive
  • The power assisted foot section incorporates anti-trap design gas strut
  • Electric height elevation from 43-97cm (17”-37”)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width 85cm (33”)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Standard 2 Section Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 325kgs (715lbs=51 stone)
  • Adjustable angle electric backrest operation from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Choice of retractable wheel or large wheel design with steering facility
  • Electric height elevation from 43-97cm (17”-37”) and 45-98cm (18”-38”) on large wheel models
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width 1055cm (41”)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Model 6207 Double foot switch operation
  • Model 6074 Side support rails (each)
  • Model 6074P Side support rail cushions (each)
  • Model 6077 Deluxe memory foam upholstery

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very stable and rigid simple 2 section examination couch. This couch will provide much assistance in the reduction of manual handling issues, as well as provide a comfortable surface for the patient to be positioned. With the choice of a retractable wheel or Large Wheel Base design, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

Medicare 2 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM2550 - Hydraulic Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM2560 - Electric Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM2570 - Electric Elevation, electric backrest, Retract Wheel Base Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable head section with positive and negative angle
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for uneven floors
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Therapy Couch – Basic & Plus Models
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: 2 Section Therapy Table - Model Choices ST2558 - Basic head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2568 - Basic head design - electric height elevation ST2559 - Plus head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2569 - Plus head design - electric height elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Basic & Plus Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • Choice of manual or electric height operation
  • Choice of models both with positive and negative adjustment of head section
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Excellent height range from 45cm (18”) to 98cm (38”)
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool

For further details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Therapy Couch – Standard Model
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very strong and rigid couch available with a  traditional “Standard” head section design, complete with breathing hole and removable plug for prone treatments.

2 Section Therapy Table - Standard Model Choices

ST2557 - Standard head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2567 - Standard head design - electric height elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • Choice of 2 models – manual or electric height operation
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Excellent height range from 45cm (18”) to 98cm (38”)
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool

For further details on accessories please call.

Please see accessories page for details

item.title: SEERS 3 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very stable and rigid simple 3 section examination couch. This couch will provide much assistance in the reduction of manual handling issues, as well as provide a comfortable surface for the patient to be positioned. With the choice of a retractable wheel or Large Wheel Base design, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

Medicare 3 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM3550 - Hydraulic Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM3560 - Electric Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM3570 - Electric Elevation, electric backrest, Retract Wheel Base   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable backrest with positive negative angle
  • Adjustable foot section with positive and negative angle
  • The power assisted head and foot sections incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for uneven floors
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

For futher details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS 3 Section Therapy Couch – Basic & Plus Models
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Incorporating both an adjustable angle backrest and a choice of head section designs “Basic” or “Plus” model with adjustable height armrests, these models are very versatile and suitable for a wide range of manual therapy techniques and various patient examination procedures.

3 Section Therapy Table - Basic & Plus Model Choices

ST3558 - Basic head design - hydraulic height elevation ST3568 - Basic head design - electric height elevation ST3559 - Plus head design (with adjustable height armrests) - hydraulic height elevation ST3569 - Plus head design (with adjustable height armrests) - electric height elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • Choice of manual or electric height operation
  • Choice of 2 models “Basic” or “Plus” head section
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Excellent height range from 45cm (18”) to 98cm (38”)
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool

For further details on accessories please call

item.title: SEERS 3 Section Therapy Drop End Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: An extremely strong and rigid 3 section couch incorporating both an adjustable angle backrest and a single drop end head section, these models are suitable for a wide range of manual therapy and patient examination procedures. 3 Section Therapy Drop End Couch - Model Choice ST3556 - Hydraulic Height Elevation ST3566 - Electric Height Elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37.7 stone)
  • Adjustable angle backrest from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Adjustable angle head section from +10 to -90 degrees negative
  • The power assisted backrest and foot sections incorporate anti-trap design gas struts
  • Head section standard with breathing hole and plug
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 48 – 101cm (19″ – 39″)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Standard width 65cm (25″)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support

For further details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS Bariatric Drop End Couches
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Bariatric Drop End Couches feature electric independently operated foot sections for effortless positioning for various lower limb procedures. The electric backrest supports the patient in the sitting position. There is a choice of models with either single or dual foot sections, all with a safe working load and lifting capacity of 325Kg (715lbs).   Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Medicare Bariatric Drop End Couches – Model Choices

MODELS

SM3484 Electric height, backrest and dual foot sections – Independently braked castors
SM3684 Electric height, backrest and dual foot sections – Central locking wheel system
SM3483 Electric height, backrest and single foot section – Independently braked castors
SM3683 Electric height, backrest and single foot section – Central locking wheel system

Standard Features
•   Safe working load and lifting capacity of 325Kg (715lbs)
•   Memory foam upholstery (60mm) for additional patient comfort
•   Choice of wheel system designs
•   Adjustable angle electric backrest operation from 0° to +80°
•   Electric foot sections, adjustable in angle from 0° to -90°
•   Electric height elevation from 50cm to 105cm
•   Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
•   Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
•   Hand switch fitted as standard
•   Standard width upholstery 105cm
•   Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Accessories
6004 Breathing hole and plug for prone treatments
6007 Head support cushion
6074 Side support rails (Pair)
6074P Side support rail cushions (Pair)
6005 Paper roll holder

item.title: SEERS Bobath Therapy Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: By tradition, Bobath treatment techniques require a suitably wide treatment surface with a safe and capable lifting capacity for both patient and therapist. The Bobath Therapy range of couches has more than achieved this with a choice of 2 sizes and a higher than standard safe working load of 250kgs (550lbs=39 stone) Bobath Therapy Couch - Model Choices ST4552 - Bobath Therapy Couch hydraulic - width 105cm (41") ST4562 - Bobath Therapy Couch electric - width 105cm (41") ST4542 - Bobath Therapy Couch electric with electric backrest-width 105cm (41") ST4552W - Bobath Therapy Couch hydraulic - width 125cm (49") ST4562W - Bobath Therapy Couch electric - width 125cm (49") ST4542W - Bobath Therapy Couch electric with electric backrest, width 125cm (49") Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 250kgs (550lbs=39 stone)
  • The power assisted head and foot section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of upholstery width-105cm (41”) or125cm (49”) or extra large model 150cm (59”)
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 46cm (18”) to 100cm (39”)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Bobath patient limb support
  • Patient handgrip supports

For further details on accessories please call.
